Title: Relates to prohibiting residential and commercial properties from operating digital billboards or signs that use flashing, intermittent or moving lights near residential property
Summary: Prohibits residential and commercial properties from operating digital billboards or signs that use flashing, intermittent or moving lights near residential property.
LawCode: Add ยง397-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting residential and commercial properties from operating digital billboards or signs that use flashing, intermittent or moving lights near residential property
